posts.content:
Hi all not posted for a long time. I've got an SO-42 tin top non walk through. There's a couple of missing items and the biggest piece I am missing is the jump seat. Ive been on the look out for one for years but had no luck. I did try reprowesty but with the shipping costs it would have been far too expensive option for me to have one made. Anyway I've given up now and bought a cheap jump seat for a walk through model just to have something next to the cool box. I may try and get someone to widen this at a later date so it fits my bus, but in the meantime what do you think would look good or be practical to fill the gap between seat and cool box?


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
